keyFacts: Attorneys are communicating about a confidential letter sent on September 21, 2020, regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's discovery and prison conditions.
The email chain shows coordination for a call between defense and government attorneys on September 22, 2020.
The correspondence includes a confidentiality notice, indicating sensitive legal discussions about Maxwell's case.
The document reveals ongoing legal proceedings and communication between defense and prosecution teams in 2020.
